Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2012 12:30AM cary wrote: hi all stage 1 sisters! i just got diagnosed and was told by doc that i have a stage 1 breast cancer. this is all new to me and i am overwhelmed, scared, angry. no surgery yet but i will need it. going to second md for another opinion. oh well. if it's a mastectomy. i cannot control it or fix this but i am preparing alot of questions to ask the doc. thanks for all of your posts. i am hopeful.
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker
